title: Trading Hot Dogs for Rice Cakes: American Cyclists Chasing Their Tour de France Dreams on the 4th of July
content:
Jorgenson, Powless, and Quinn give up barbecues and picnics to follow their racing dreams: 'Maybe I'd rather be at a lake with my friends, but I am living my dream.'

Read the full article at Trading Hot Dogs for Rice Cakes: American Cyclists Chasing Their Tour de France Dreams on the 4th of July on Velo.
author: ahood
